snippet.title: BattleWords App Promo
snippet.description:
BattleWords is a fast-paced multiplayer word game! Invite your friends to play, make new friends by playing against random opponents or limit yourself to practice matches.
Playing is easy, mastering the game is extremely difficult. The objective of the game is to gain score by pairing letters into words by swiping adjacent letters. An online-match consists of three rounds at a minimum of 60 seconds per round, after three rounds the winner becomes the player with the highest combined score.

Get BattleWords for FREE for your device with the following links:

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=se.codestream.battlewords

iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/battlewords-for-friends/id1033012764?mt=8

Windows 10: https://www.microsoft.com/nb-no/store/apps/battlewords/9nblggh4v321
